column3: â€œThis is certainly a top shelf strain, that blasted my senses with many citrus aromas with the flavor to back it up. Very energetic, yet very mellow feeling with a gentle comedown. Great for stating your day off right.â€

â€œDelicious, citrusy, straight up sativa! 

If hybrids make you fall asleep, and you're looking for a daytime strain to supplement your ADHD medication, I am 100% recommending this strain for you!
 
Clear headed and focused, but can still pack a punch if you feel like getting super baked. 

Not ideal for sleepy time, but somehow kickass for meditation. 

 Best wake n' bake strain to date!â€
â€œlove this bud, I found it to be very energetic, upbeat high, taste amazing. The down side is that it is in short supply.â€
â€œToo notch, good uplifting high, a little pressure behind the eyes, but I'm super relaxed and my anxiety is zero"â€"

â€œThis strain is rad it smells strongly of orange.  The taste is so good too. Just very orange flavor.  I really enjoy the high. Took a trip to the beach feel happy and relaxed. I would buy more for sureâ€

This strain personally gave me cottonmouth pretty bad every time I smoked it., but not to the point to where I hate this s...â€

â€œEnjoyed a bit of this citrus-y goodness today. The flavor is intense and one can really taste the THC. Really calmed me down and lasted a good while. I would recommend this for morning use. Thanks PotCargo!â€

â€œStarts off a very tingly and head-heavy high, then mellows out into a relaxing buzz that's great for morning tokers. One thing that I love about this strain is that I experienced very little to no paranoia or anxiety, even when trying to push my limits." Mixed this with "Love Potion #1" at one point and was fried out of my brains.â€"
â€œgreat strain. probably the best tasting strain I've hit too. nice fruit tasteâ€

â€œMy local dispensary provided this for $30 per 10 gram 1/4 so I got an excellent deal on this. i feel like I had to smoke a lot to feel its effects, but it's definitely a decent smoke. if you can find it really cheap, it's worth a try. I found that it always helped me focus and concentrate on my own thoughts so if you're a daytime smoker this is good, but make sure to have another strain to mix it up or else you'll gr...â€

â€œFor someone who only smokes indicas, Twisted Citrus got me hooked. It's a nice vibe smoke and it's stinks like citrus and oranges. It's tastes better then how it smells. It's a pretty strong strain and I really recommended it. 9/10â€
â€œDelicious smelling sativa. Doesn't get me too stoned, able to function socially in a good mood.â€
â€œNot normally a Sativa person but Whoa! I havenâ€™t been this baked in awhile. All head buzz right now and canâ€™t wait for a chill afternoon then some work lol. Good flavour and beautiful nugs.â€
â€œI got a distillate cartridge weighing in at about 68% THC and 17% CBD. Euphoric and uplifting with a great body high.â€
â€œnice upliftedâ€
â€œthe high is uplifting really like it for morningsâ€
â€œsecond time around with this strain and it was just as good as the first.â€
â€œvery nice body high, decent taste and smell, nice budsâ€
â€œGood head high. Good for the sativa crowd. Very hairy and orange. Good flavor too.â€

â€œNot bad but not very potent I find, it gives you an alright high but doesn't seem to last all that long for me. I must say that the description doesn't lie, as soon as you open your grinder all you can smell is that strong almost orange peel scent.â€
